description.name: tusderc20
description.tagline: True USD erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-tusd Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept True USD erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/tusd receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/tusd wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
